text:
<@U0695UMTM2M> so i was going to use it for multiple checkbox field (custom property) with countries-> where a user chooses X Country/ies and then the contact information from our representative from this country is then sent in an email

If you need an example just take the first 10 options from the industry dropdown from the company.

I really just need the code logic behind this bc everything after that is pretty easy to do.
I am thinking something like having every contact info for every option in one single text property stored and to then have the code check for which field checkbox was checked and then fill up another CustomProperty lets call it "Sum of Contact info" with the information of the choices that had been checked.

The only problem really that i need to solve via code is the branching issue so yea

Hey Everyone!
Has anyone found a way on how to utilise this Chatspotintegration in a workflow?
Is there a way on how i can use this via API?

(I want to gather data based on company domain and when a new contact is created and the company doesnt exist in HubSpot -> create a new company)
Is there a better/easier way then using ChatSpot/ another programm/ just plain code to use?
I am open for any suggestions/ideas doesnt matter how complicated it might seem!TY :slightly_smiling_face:
